title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically. This behavior can be observed in all tabs of the TabFolder as well as in all Frames.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are observed to flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost Frames should be repainted, eliminating the excessive flashing.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe the flashing in all tabs of the TabFolder and all Frames.
